metadata.title: CVE-2023-30402 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** YASM v1.3.0 was discovered to contain a heap overflow viathe function handle_dot_label at /nasm/nasm-token.re. Note: This has beendisputed by third parties who argue this is a bug and not a security issuebecause yasm is a standalone program not designed to run untrusted code.

criterions.comment: yasm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
